front.title: Verifiable Oblivious Pseudo-Random Functions with Public Metadata

abstract.t: This document describes a verifable mechansim to bind public metadata to an existing Verifiable oblivious Pseduo-Random function [I-D.irtf-cfrg-voprf] (VOPRF). Using zero knowledge proofs a receiver can verify that, for an input x, a VOPRF(k, x, metadata), is generated from a secret key k, as well as the given metadata.
